last_episode_to_air.name: Pehlwani
last_episode_to_air.overview: Athletes have grappled in Pehlwani wrestling contests for centuries in India. Now women are competing in an arena once reserved for men.

name: Home Game
overview: This docuseries profiles unique and dangerous traditional sports from around the world, as well as the communities and cultures where they thrive.

episodes.name: Calcio Storico
episodes.overview: Rugby meets mixed martial arts in the brutally violent calcio storico, a traditional sport of Florence, Italy, that dates back nearly 500 years.

episodes.name: Highland Games
episodes.overview: Scotland's Highland games combine a cultural celebration with challenging athletic tests of strength — including the unique caber toss.

episodes.name: Freediving
episodes.overview: For many in the Philippines, freediving without oxygen is a way of life. It's also a demanding sport that pushes the limits of the human body.

episodes.name: Roller Derby
episodes.overview: In Austin, Texas, skaters find an inclusive and supportive community in roller derby, a competition that blends high speed and physical combat.

episodes.name: Kok Boru
episodes.overview: In Kyrgyzstan, players throw themselves into the national sport of kok boru, a rough pololike game played on horses — with a dead goat as the ball.

episodes.name: Catch Fétiche
episodes.overview: Professional wrestling in the Congo mixes athleticism and showmanship, but adds a layer of voodoo mysticism that makes it unlike anything else.

episodes.name: Makepung Lampit
episodes.overview: Unique to Bali's Jembrana region, Makepung Lampit puts its own spin on drag racing. The vehicle is a water buffalo, the track a flooded rice field.

episodes.name: Pehlwani
episodes.overview: Athletes have grappled in Pehlwani wrestling contests for centuries in India. Now women are competing in an arena once reserved for men.
